name: Clone Getaway
description:
Prototype created for the "NM i Gameplay" game jam contest. The theme was "Cloning" and I elected to make a game where you create a little professor who can clone himself to solve some puzzles.

Later on you get the ability to swap position with what you fire upon, which is very useful to get around.

The game has 9 levels, each introducing a new mechanic. Each level completion is rewarded with 0-3 stars. Use as few clones as possible to earn 3 stars.
